frontmatter.title: Components
frontmatter.description: Customizable components with an ecosystem of plugins.

frontmatter.title: Themes
frontmatter.description: UI themes with advanced interactions and animations.

frontmatter.title: Badge
frontmatter.description: Component for showing short and relevant tags.

frontmatter.title: Breadcrumbs
frontmatter.description: Examples of breadcrumbs, with all the basic functionality and more.

frontmatter.title: Button
frontmatter.description: Simple and extensible button styles.

frontmatter.title: Card
frontmatter.description: Multi purpose component to style and contain content.

frontmatter.title: Form
frontmatter.description: Form styles with multiple layouts, custom checkbox/radio, javascript validation, and more.

frontmatter.title: Hero
frontmatter.description: Hero markup component for pages introductions or banners.

frontmatter.title: Icon
frontmatter.description: Everything you need to stylize svg icons.

frontmatter.title: Link
frontmatter.description: Default link styles for html links, can also be applied to buttons and other tags.

frontmatter.title: List
frontmatter.description: Flex component to space any element with margins, also spaces vertically.

frontmatter.title: List Group
frontmatter.description: List subcomponent to group up buttons, inputs and other content.

frontmatter.title: Listing
frontmatter.description: Listing markup component for category pages or simple product listing.

frontmatter.title: Loader
frontmatter.description: Plug and play visual loaders, can easily integrate with javascript.

frontmatter.title: Media
frontmatter.description: Wrapper to have media with aspect ratio, also on page load, useful also for advanced animations.

frontmatter.title: Note
frontmatter.description: Small cards to display notes.

frontmatter.title: Pagination
frontmatter.description: Toolbar component for pagination.

frontmatter.title: Row
frontmatter.description: Flex component to space columns with paddings, also spaces vertically.

frontmatter.title: Table
frontmatter.description: Base styles for all tables overridable with tailwind classes.

frontmatter.title: Toolbar
frontmatter.description: Simple toolbar component as a subcomponent of list group.

frontmatter.title: Typography
frontmatter.description: Component for customize headers, body text, text tags and lists.

frontmatter.title: Group Number
frontmatter.description: Input number with list group and javascript for and effective interaction.

frontmatter.title: Separator
frontmatter.description: Separator to be used in text content

frontmatter.title: Textarea Autosize
frontmatter.description: Textarea with dynamic height depending on content.

frontmatter.title: Animation
frontmatter.description: Animation components and utilities with css or javascript transitions/animations.

frontmatter.title: Javascript
frontmatter.description: Javascript utilities and animations usability improvements.

frontmatter.title: Jump to Content
frontmatter.description: Example aria jump to content that activates on focus using the tab key.

frontmatter.title: Layout
frontmatter.description: Structural and layout components.

frontmatter.title: Collapse
frontmatter.description: Collapse horizontal and vertical on interactions.

frontmatter.title: Mousefollow
frontmatter.description: Javascript animation utility to follow mouse position.

frontmatter.title: Ripple
frontmatter.description: Material ripple effect on user interaction.

frontmatter.title: Sticky Footer
frontmatter.description: Example with simple markup and css for a sticky footer.

frontmatter.title: Drop
frontmatter.description: Nested navigation to show on user interaction, can contain lists and more complex graphics.

frontmatter.title: Navigation
frontmatter.description: Various navigation components from basic to advanced.

frontmatter.title: Overlay
frontmatter.description: Use overlay when you need to display any content over the main page, comes in different options and factors.

frontmatter.description: Content interactions and animations when you scroll the page, sticky pinned elements, fade elements, parallax.

frontmatter.description: Informations or elements to show on user interaction, can contain simple text and more complex graphics.

frontmatter.description: Simple example of multilevel navigation with toggle component.

frontmatter.title: Nav Sides
frontmatter.description: Arrow navigation on sides that appears and follows the mouse.

frontmatter.description: Automatically scroll to elements or anchors with automatic activation on scroll.

frontmatter.title: Status

frontmatter.description: Advanced animation for postion sticky to show content on scroll for better usability.
